section.mdiv: E5 A5 G5 E5 A5 G5 E5
E5 Oh baby it's cryin' time Oh baby I got to fly A5 G5 Got to try to find a way E5 A5 Got to try to get away G5 E5 'Cause you know I gotta get away from you babe
E5 Oh baby the river's red, ah baby in my head A5 G5 There's a funny feelin' goin' on E5 A5 G5 I don't think I can hold out long
G6/D And when the owls cry in the night Asus2 Oh baby, baby when the pines begin to cry Baby, baby, baby how do you feel? G6/D If the river runs dry, baby, how do you feel?
E5 A5 G5 E5 A5 G5 E5
E5 A5 Craze, baby, the rainbow's end, mmm, baby, it's just a den G5 E5 For those who hide, hide their love to depths of life A5 G5 And ruin dreams that we all knew so, babe
G6/D And when the owls cry in the night Asus2 Oh baby when the pines begin to cry Oh baby, baby, how do you feel? G6/D If the river runs dry, baby, how do you feel?
G6/D Asus2 G6/D A Baby how do you feel?

E5 Ooh yeah, brave I endure Ooh yeah, strong shields and lore A5 G5 They can't hold the wrath of those who walk E5 A5 An' the boots of those who march G5 E5 E5 Baby, through the roads of time so long ago
